mapper.insert: insert into smart_humidity (h_id, h_time, h_value, h_level) values (#{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select h_id, h_time, h_value, h_level from smart_humidity
select * from smart_humidity order by h_id desc limit 4 ;
select DATE(h_time),min(h_value),MAX(h_value) from(select * from smart_humidity where h_time>=date_add(now(),interval -5 day)) as s GROUP BY DAY(h_time);
select h_time,min(h_value) from(select * from smart_humidity where h_time>=date_add(now(),interval -5 day)) as s GROUP BY DAY(h_time);
